title: Calories in a Chorizo
meta_description: Discover calories in a chorizo, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Cured pork chorizo sausage, standard 100g link; uncooked/ready-to-eat as common for Spanish-style; no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (Spanish vs. Mexican), brand, fat content, curing process, and serving size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 100g chorizo sausage provides ~468 kcal, mainly from fat and protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chorizo sausage?
faqs.a: About 468 kcal for one 100g cured pork chorizo.
Yes, ~40g total fat per 100g, including 14g saturated.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chorizo?

faqs.a: Very low, about 1.9g carbs and 0g fiber per chorizo.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in chorizo?
faqs.a: Curing process adds salt; ~1500mg sodium per 100g serving.
